scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.build: echo 'Starting build' && cd frontend && npm install && echo 'Frontend dependencies installed' && npm run build && echo 'Frontend build complete' && cd .. && cd backend && npm install && echo 'Backend dependencies installed' && cd .. && echo 'Moving build folder' && mv frontend/build . && echo 'Build folder moved' && ls -la
